channel.title: Tops on Si Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Si Chen

item.description: I am a third year doctoral students at University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, School of Information Sciences. I am passionate in designing and evaluating multi-modal education technology. I also has strong interests in designing for minority community, e.g. deaf and hard of hearing, ethnic minorities. I work with Prof. Yun Huang () and Prof. Lawerence Angrave (). During my undergrad at Tsinghua University, I also worked with Prof Pei-Luen Patrick Rau ().
Machine learning学习笔记 Coursera 在线课程 Machine learning 笔记讲师: 吴恩达(Andrew Ng) 课程地址：https://www.coursera.org/lear
